pages.title: The Verdant Heart
pages.text: The Elderwood Heart is a rare and sacred remnant of ancient times. Long ago, Elderwood Guardians roamed the groves, protecting their sacred grounds and blessing travelers who brought them offerings of flowers.$(br)Now, only a few of these hearts remain, hidden deep within the Willows.
When used in ritual, the Verdant Heart radiates a powerful aura of natural magic.

pages.title: The Ritual
pages.text: Construct a ritual pillar by placing 1 Infused Dirt block in the ground, stacking 2 Willow Logs on top, and placing the Elderwood Heart at the top.$(br)Surround the pillar with 4 Salted Ritual Braziers, positioned three blocks away. Place any type of flower inside each brazier.$(br)With this setup complete, use a Hex Focus on the Elderwood Heart to begin the ritual.$(br)Once activated, right-click the Elderwood Heart with a potion of your choice to infuse its magical aura with the potion's effects.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: Once activated, you can right-click the Elderwood Heart with a Hex Focus to deactivate it.$(br)The magical aura's remaining duration is represented by green circular particles â€” the dimmer they appear, the less time remains.$(br)You can extend the aura's duration by growing crops nearby. The heart will absorb nearby fully-grown crops to replenish its energy if needed.
